tool.name: Convert to FASTA (seqtk)
tool.help:
usage: fitsinfo [-h] [--version] filename [filename ...]
Print a summary of the HDUs in a FITS file(s).
This script is part of the Astropy package. See https://docs.astropy.org/en/latest/io/fits/usage/scripts.html#module-astropy.io.fits.scripts.fitsinfo for further documentation.
positional arguments: filename Path to one or more FITS files. Wildcards are supported.
optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit --version show program's version number and exit
